name: Nuvah
description:
Nuvah Medical and HealthCare Institute is one of the pioneer institutes in India to provide online/offline & hybrid technical training for paramedical aspirants. The institute is a subsidiary of Bilmed Ultrasound Training Institute. Bilmed Institute is existing for more than a decade and imparting quality medical training & Skill upgradation among Medicos across the globe through its digital server-based course. Nuvah is an initiative by to imbibe the same quality of skills & training for Nursing & Para-Medic fraternity in India & Abroad.
 It aims to provide the finest technical and career-oriented vocational courses in the field of paramedic and allied healthcare. Nuvah institute is approved by Brit Qualis (London, UK). NUVAH has a well-trained staff that provides focused healthcare services with contemporary technology. Nuvah is internationally approved and in accordance with Brit Qualis from London (United Kingdom)
Headline: Paramedical Course Institute
ShortDescription: Our aim is to provide the finest career-oriented vocational courses in the field of healthcare. Our Institute is ISO:9001 Quality Certified. Our center is approved by Brit Qualis (London, UK).
enhanced_description: Nuvah Medical and HealthCare Institute, launched in 2021, is a pioneer in India for providing online, offline, and hybrid technical training to paramedical and nursing aspirants. As a subsidiary of Bilmed Ultrasound Training Institute, Nuvah leverages over a decade of expertise in quality medical training. The institute aims to deliver the finest technical and career-oriented vocational courses in paramedic and allied healthcare, including specialized programs like Xray Technician Course, Ultrasound Technician Course, and Ultrasound Learning Program. Nuvah is ISO:9001 Quality Certified and internationally approved by Brit Qualis from London, UK, ensuring high standards of training and skill upgradation for medical professionals in India and abroad.
